0803|8:03 A.M.|8:03 A.M.
People in Evanston moved so goddamn slow. it was one thing when the sidewalks were covered in ice and lake-effect snow. But this was June
column2: the day after Braque’s cousin Eva’s birthday
column3: which used to mean a big family party marking the beginning of summer
column4: at least before her dad left and her brother Randy went into rehab.
